channel.title: Make walls and change ground colours
channel.description:
hey everyone,
is it possible to make walls in your server? and can you also change the colour of the ground?

item.title: Make walls and change ground colours
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

thanks heaps for you help

Read full topic
item.source: Make walls and change ground colours

item.title: Make walls and change ground colours
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

sonjichan:

that sounds more like a client hacking question. As the graphics are stored clientside. Um… The making walls part… if you mean spawning walls you can create gameobjects that will spawn at the coords you specify. but as for changing colors and graphics you should ask that in the client hacking section.

The first one about making walls is Server side… the second one about ground color si client side.

Read full topic
item.source: Make walls and change ground colours

item.title: Make walls and change ground colours
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

Yea, its possible, some servers have makeGlobalObject or addGlobalObject <- That would be server side NOT client side
Search either of them in your client.java

looks like this

makeGlobalObject(3258,3438,2854,3,0);

Like I said it could be addGlobalObject dunno

…Thats acaully code for a wall object ^ lol I believe its set up like (object id,x,y,facing direction,object type)

object type is defined by this:

ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration

As far as adding that function to a server that doesn’t have it, dunno there :o There was a Tut on it somewhere…

Read full topic
item.source: Make walls and change ground colours
